50899 54357 People once believed
that when someone dies,

54441 57574 a crow carries their soul

70688 72705 the crow can bring that soul back
72789 74954 to put the wrong things right.

294714 296863 two people who are meant to be together,

425009 427009 from all the crap floating around in it.

837553 840175 Fire it up! Fire it up!
840259 843376 Fire it up! Fire it up! Fire it up! Fire it up!

1656173 1657453 It was pawned here a year ago
1657537 1659504 by a customer of yours named Tin Tin.

1803518 1806222 Funboy. He lives there upstairs, all right?
1820766 1825192 Each one of these is a life,
1827674 1829509 I'm begging you, all right? Don't kill me.

1884797 1887237 It's on the house, kiddo, you know that.

1895346 1899744 Your mom, technically,

1919865 1923537 And I say I'm dead. And I move.
1924639 1927310 Not one more step. I'm serious.
1927576 1931776 Then shoot, if you will, Officer Albrecht.

1932075 1934581 What, are you, nuts?

1946859 1948711 I want you to move over to the curb there.

1948795 1951466 Go on, real nice and easy.

1953569 1955668 Okay, we're gonna wait here for backup.
1956099 1958374 It's getting too freaking weird for me.

2004521 2006521 and you lose him right out in the open.

2011429 2013446 walking against the wind shit I hate that.

2026741 2028576 Yeah, I may get it. I know.
2040755 2043806 There are energies aligning against you.

2069586 2071900 Nobody cleared this little event with me.

2175120 2177021 It's more like surfing than skating.

2180994 2182664 It can't rain all the time.

2229680 2232648 and her nice rock-'n'-roll

2527241 2529846 on the lips and hearts of all children.

2924902 2926638 Other than that, my day sucked.

3001583 3003517 Now, let's take it from the top, friend.

3016994 3019863 Draven. He said his name was Eric Draven.

3578291 3580291 This is the 7:00 am edition
of Action News.

3580964 3583146 For over a decade,

3583230 3585280 has had a darker and deadlier nickname

3587432 3591104 The name given to what has become

3591304 3594124 Last year, over 200 individual
blazes were reported,

3598040 3601411 of what may become the biggest and
deadliest Devil's Night ever.

3602051 3604920 The mayor has fire fighters from

3605351 3608924 Do you like them up or over?

3611489 3613962 What are you doing?

3619464 3622300 So what do you want now?

3623402 3626238 So what did you take to become
mother of the year?

3627439 3631474 It wasn't drugs.

3640023 3642353 Did you win the lottery

3645556 3649492 Forget it. I never was too

3677522 3679539 We just fished this out of the river.

3685894 3689021 Looks like he zigged
when he should have zagged.
3701546 3703332 I got a goddamn vigilante killer
3703416 3705235 knocking off scumbags left and right,
3705319 3707286 and you're covering up for somebody.

3715292 3719480 with some weirdo who winds up in T-Bird's

3719564 3722219 Then you steal one of my
case files from homicide,

3722303 3724380 and you're saying this is just

love note waiting for you.

3736185 3739071 Welcome to the first day of

3932711 3934711 Get so lonely all by myself.

4003518 4005535 And now this ghost gonna kill my ass next!
4009854 4012459 This ghost gonna kill my ass next.

4071784 4073685 Maybe it was your fairy godfather.

4199043 4200862 I thought we'd throw a little party,
4200946 4203914 start a bunch of fires, make a little profit.

4241657 4243839 See, that's what's

4246728 4248827 it'd put a big old smile on my face.
